name: Lost knowledge
description:
" Lost knowledge " is a 3D chasing game with a horror-like atmosphere by escaping from the imperfect AI when the system thinks you are an intruder.

Short story

at a distant planet When a group of engineers tried to use robots AI to patrol the building at night, even if the system still has problems To find a fix point in time for submitting work tomorrow Meanwhile, a little boy named "Monkey Bird" who came to visit the research laboratory forgets the book he brought to take notes and will go back to the provinces tomorrow morning. He must collect all 13 missing books without being caught by those imperfect robots.

Conditions for winning the game

-  Collect all 13 books, then the front door will unlock.

- When the AI robot is found, hide in the cabinet to make the sensor undetectable or cause The robot gets bugged by teleporting through the door.

-Message from developer-

This is my first game, thank you for playing. Feedback or suggestions can be made through comments and I hope you enjoy our game :)
